name: Rogue Figther
description: A top-down and fast-paced shooter that pits you against an entire pirate fleet. Can you survive through the Main Game? (There are five levels total that change once you reach a certain score) If so, attempt to get the highest score possible in Endless mode. Movement is controlled with either WASD or the arrow keys and Spacebar is to fire lasers. (note: Fullscreen mode highly recommended)
